#summary Describes the various tool chains.
#labels Phase-Implementation,Phase-Design,Phase-Requirements
This lists the various tool chains TeamXbow are using and where to download them. 
*Maps:* edit in Cube - *OK*

*C Code:*  can edit and compile source with CodeBlox/WinGNU combo - *OK*

*Config files and scripts:* can edit and alter with any text editor - *OK*

*2D Graphics* (HUD etc) - can edit and alter [http://www.oldversion.com/Paint-Shop-Pro.html Paint Shop Pro 9.0] - *OK*

*Sound* can edit, convert and alter sound with Audacity - *OK*

*Models* - 'Houstan we *HAD* a *PROBLEM*' but now it is fixed. Thanks to [http://files.turbosquid.com/Products/L567271/XFM83W83US/gmax12.exe GMax] and some plugins.
